component.name: Azul Box
component.summary: A wraper for ffmpeg and yt-dlp written in rust.

description.p: - Download music from link with metadata/cover embedded with synced lyric(lyric do not work for WAV) - Download Video from link with highest quality with some metadata embeded - Download Pin from pinterest without account - Convert Images formats powered by ffmpeg - Convert Video formats powered by ffmpeg
The video/music download will technically support all yt-dlp [support list](https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/blob/master/supportedsites.md) not just youtube.
